department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The purpose of this RFI is to gather information and interest in this planned project
description:
The purpose of this RFI is to:
Gather information and interest in this planned project
Provide awareness of this planned project to the local Indigenous business community and industry
Initiate an industry and community consultative process
This project will take place on the traditional territories of the BC Treaty 8 First Nations
Determine Indigenous business and industrial capacity of local First Nations
full_summary:
**Tender Title**
EZ011-240817 - Call for Information for Alaska Highway Maintenance Contract
**Publication Date**: August 17, 2023
**Close Date for Submissions**: August 31, 2023, 14:00:00 MDT

**Solicitation Number**: WS4152191452
**Method of Procurement**: Competitive
**Category of Goods and Services**: Highways and road construction services

**Request for Information**: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issued a Request for Information for a planned maintenance project on the Alaska Highway.

**Background and Objective**: The project is to gather information about the interest and capacity of local Indigenous businesses and the industry to participate in the project. Meetings and sessions will be held for the purpose of awareness, consultative process, and to facilitate business partnerships and subcontracting opportunities.

**Key Highlights**:

* Project Location: Traditional territories of BC Treaty 8 First Nations
* Industry Engagement: Sessions will be conducted to discuss partnerships, subcontracting and skills development
* Contract Duration: December 31, 2023 to March 31, 2024
* Closing Date for Submissions: August 31, 2023, 14:00:00 MDT

**Further Details**: You can view the tender documents on Ariba Discovery.

**Primary Contact**:

* Summer Wong (he/she)
* Summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: This text does not include any detailed attachments, but it simply provides a professional and clear format to render the same information in. Do not repeat unnecessary information. Ensure the text clearly conveys the necessary information about the call for information for the maintenance project of the Alaska highway. Be sure you maintain proper formatting and use professional language.   markdown format. 

**      Tenders are now closed.    **

Quiz: 
- Documentation and whitepaper writing projects involve technical writing tasks. These tasks often include re-writing texts written in poor quality. This is an example of:
A. Tour writing.
B. Journalistic writing.
C. Copywriting.
D. Technical writing.



Answer: D. Technical writing.
